session.goal: Session 3 — Intelligence Services Part 1: all 6 anticipation engine detectors

changes.summary: Implemented all 6 intelligence services (anticipation-engine, aging-detector, streak-guardian, deadline-radar, pattern-recognizer, priority-synthesizer) with 44 comprehensive tests
decisions_made: Anticipation Engine: orchestrator runs all 4 detectors via Promise.allSettled, logs timing and signal counts
Aging Detector: emails age at 24h/48h/72h thresholds, tasks at 3+ days stale, skips promotions/replied/archived
Streak Guardian: severity escalates with streak length (>=7 days = urgent vs <7 days = attention)
Deadline Radar: tasks (0-3 day window), projects (0-7 day window), calendar events (30-minute warning)
Pattern Recognizer: analyzes completion rate trends, peak hours, day-of-week patterns, category neglect (7+ days)
Priority Synthesizer: deduplicates signals (same type+entity → keep highest severity), scores via severity×time×domain factors
All signals use uuid() for id generation, auto_actionable=false (require user confirmation)
